summary: This bill, the "Screening for Communities to Receive Early and Equitable Needed Services for Cancer Act of 2025" (SCREENS for Cancer Act of 2025), reauthorizes and improves the National Breast and Cervical Cancer Early Detection Program (NBCCEDP) for fiscal years 2026-2030. It amends the Public Health Service Act to enhance services, expand outreach, reduce disparities in cancer incidents, and improve access to screenings. The bill also mandates a GAO study on the program's effectiveness.
